title: WTB St. Louis National PSA/SGC graded T202, T205, T206, and T207 cards
author: cwazzy

posts.post_title: WTB St. Louis National PSA/SGC graded T202, T205, T206, and T207 cards
posts.post_content:
I'd like to add a couple T-cards to my lower-grade Cardinals set and am hoping that someone can help me out. I'm looking for PSA/SGC 1-3 range cards. Some paper loss and writing on the back are okay but the front must be nicely centered with good eye appeal and no heavy creases. Rounded corners are fine. Here is what I currently have. I need the rest.

T202
Catching Him Napping

T205
Bresnahan (closed mouth)
Lush
Corridon

T206
Bresnahan (portrait)
Byrne
Gilbert
Hulswit
Willis (throwing)

T207
Steinfeldt

I can only afford a couple for now but might be able to work out a deal for more in the future. 

Thanks in advance!

Chris
